channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Santander bike in the park firld, 23rd July
item.description:
Abandoned santander bike in Beckenham Place Park, next to burned motorbike

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Benbury Close, Southend, London

item.title: Missing Bollard on the corner of Broadwick Street and Hopkins Street, 23rd July
item.description:
This is a tight corner and there is no bollard in place at the tightest spot, which is leading to recurring damage to the building on the corner. The smashed glass from these incidents are a danger to the public, and is a considerable waste of resources replacing the damaged pane of glass constantly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Hopkins Street, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken bon won't close, 23rd July
item.description:
The bin has been broken for many months now and won't close. Rubbish spills everywhere.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Church Street, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Large overhanging tree outside No.16 needs pruning and large wasp nest causing disruption., 23rd July
item.description:
An ongoing problem that has not been addressed appropriately in the last few years. This tree is way too large and local residents have had to climb it themselves to cut off overhanging branches. Please go and see it before closing this report. There is now a large wasp nest in it, causing significant disruption to residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Villiers Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering against home, 23rd July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glebe Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Bags of rubbish - Westheath Rec Ground, Clovelly Rd, 23rd July
item.description:
Rubbish collection for Westheath recreation grounds What describes you best? I'm a Bexley resident What is your enquiry? I have tied up all the rubbish bags by the bins in the park this morning which had been ripped open by foxes - could someone please collect them today or the foxes will open them again tonight. The bins are in westheath recreation ground.in front of the children’s play area. Several black bags of rubbish need collecting. Please pick them up today - I don’t fancy having to pick up all the rubbish again in the morning!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heath Avenue, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
